name: Fishing Planet Anniversary Pack
detailed_description:
August 11th is the day when Fishing Planet was first released to the public a few years ago! This very special Pack isn’t just meant to honor the beginning of our mutual journey towards our virtual fishing dream.
Fishing Planet Anniversary Pack is basically a wonderful bargain combining everything you might need for going after the big bad Salmon in our FP Anniversary Cup. Make sure you’re the number one Salmon catcher with the exclusive super powerful spinning combos of Salmonster™ muscular rods and
RedFish™ reels meant to withstand any pressure a Salmon fishing Tournament might bring. Exclusive equipment available only in this limited edition Pack along with all the spinners, crankbaits, jigheads and other tackle to help you gain your rightful title of the FPA Cup Champion!
In short, Fishing Planet Anniversary Pack is a set of superb tackle and equipment that you’ll need for getting the most fun and drive out of big game fishing for the red monsters lurking in the depth of unexplored Alaskan waterways.

Fishing Planet Anniversary Pack includes:
* 40 000 CREDITS use the Credits to purchase new tackle, pay for fishing trips, repairs and any other in-game expenses.
* 20 BAITCONS use to purchase advanced fishing tackle, available only for Baitcoins. Spend your Baitcoins wisely!
* 7-DAY PREMIUM Enjoy seven days of Premium Status and advance your game progress by getting a 50% boost to Experience and Credits earned for every fish you catch! You also get the privilege of free registration in Competitions and the advantage of using free Forward Time function twice as often!

RODS ‘N REELS to enhance your skills in catching some of the biggest Salmon.
Rods:
* Rivertex™ Salmonster™ 220 - Length: 8' 2"; Lure Weight: 5/8 – 2 Oz; Power: X-Heavy; Line Weight: 15 – 42 lb; Action: Mod Fast; Pieces: 2; Guides: 10 (Length: 2.5 m; Lure Weight: 18–56 g; Power: X-Heavy; Line Weight: 7–19.5 kg; Action: Mod Fast; Pieces: 2; Guides: 10)
* Rivertex™ Salmonster™ 270 - Length: 8' 10"; Lure Weight: 3/4 – 2 1/8 Oz; Power: X-Heavy; Line Weight: 18 – 46 lb; Action: Mod Fast; Pieces: 2; Guides: 11 (Length: 2.7 m; Lure Weight: 21–60 g; Power: X-Heavy; Line Weight: 8.5–21 kg; Action: Mod Fast; Pieces: 2; Guides: 11)
Reels:
* Rivertex™ RedFish™ 4500 - Ratio: 5.4:1; Recovery: 27.5"; Capacity: mono 20/110, braid 30/145; Max Drag: 35 Lb.; (Ratio: 5.4:1; Recovery: 80 cm; Capacity: mono 0.4/110, braid 0.28/145; Max Drag: 17.0 kg)
* Rivertex™ RedFish™ 5500 - Ratio: 5.4:1; Recovery: 31.5"; Capacity: mono 32/110, braid 30/180; Max Drag: 42 Lb; (Ratio: 5.4:1; Recovery: 80 cm; Capacity: mono 0.5/110, braid 0.28/180; Max Drag: 19.0 kg)

LURES a selection of lures we put a lot of thought into, so that you can sit back and just catch that Salmon!
Lines:
* Fluoro .022" - Length: 1000 yd; Test: 35 Lb; (Length: 1000 m; Test: 15.8 kg; Diameter: 0.55 mm)
* Fluoro .024" - Length: 1000 yd; Test: 40 Lb; (Length: 1000 m; Test: 18.1 kg; Diameter: 0.6 mm)
Lures:
* JigHeads: JigHead #6/0 1 Oz. (30 g), JigHead #4/0 7/8 Oz. (25 g), JigHead #3/0 3/4 Oz. (21 g), JigHead #4/0 1 1/2 Oz. (42 g), JigHead #6/0 1 5/8 Oz. (48 g), JigHead #4/0 2 Oz. (56 g), JigHead #6/0 2 Oz. (56 g)
* Softbait: Nymphes 3" (7 cm) (x2) Nymphes 4" (10 cm) (x2)
* Spoons: Single Spoon 1Oz. (28 g), #3/0 (x3) Single Spoon 1 1/2 Oz. (42 g), #6/0 (x3)
* Spinners: Bullet Spinner 6/7 Oz. (24 g), #2/0 (x4), Bullet Spinner 1 1/4 Oz. (36 g), #4/0 (x4)
* Crankbaits: Crankbait 3 ft (1 m), #3/0, Crankbait 6 ft (2 m), #3/0, Crankbait 8 ft (2.5 m), #6/0, Crankbait 12 ft (3.5 m), #4/0, Crankbait 16 ft (5 m), #3/0, Crankbait 16 ft (5 m), #6/0

EQUIPMENT – Some valuable items of the limited Fishing Planet Anniversary collectible edition!
* FPA Cup Jacket - Tackles: 15; Lines: 2
* FPA Cup Rod Case - Rods: 2; Reels: 2
* FishCastle XXL Fishnet - Max Single Fish Weight: 110 Lb.; Total Fish Weight: 440 Lb.; Fish-Friendly: yes; (Max Single Fish Weight: 50 kg; Total Fish Weight: 200 kg; Fish-Friendly: yes)

LICENSES:
* Advanced Alaska License
* Advanced Alberta License
* Advanced Michigan License
* Advanced California License

supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese-Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2 GB GDDR5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
